title: Cucumber-Dill Farro Salad
directions: Cook farro according to package directions.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat, and simmer 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and water is mostly absorbed.
Drain; place farro in a bowl.
Meanwhile, use a sharp vegetable peeler or a mandoline slicer to slice cucumbers lengthwise into thin ribbons.
Combine farro, cucumbers, beans, onion, and pine nuts in a large bowl.
Whisk together oil, dill, balsamic vinegar, lemon rind, salt and pepper. Drizzle dressing over salad; toss to coat.
ingredients: 2 (15-oz) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
